Reviews.Title: “Never Paid So Much For a Less Than Average Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Kabecka
Reviews.Content: We booked this through a third party for 289 a night for a sleep number bed. We basically had no other options because we had to book our trip late and the college kids were in town for spring break. We arrived and they put us in a room with 2 double beds, no Sleep Number bed. The front desk gave me no help so the 3rd party had to call on my behalf. The hotel admitted they had overbooked, had no rooms with Sleepnumber beds, and refunded me just $20. The rooms were just so so, not dirty but in so so shape. The room looked worn, not even close to the type of room I'd expect for the price. The pool area seemed fine, although we didn't use it. A shuttle was available to take guests downtown for free every half hour, that was nice especially since the hotel is nowhere near the "action" in Key West. The continental breakfast in the a.m. was fairly nice....cereal, toast, bagels, yogurt, eggs, sausage, coffee, juice, waffle makers, etc. I recommend looking around and finding a nicer place if you are spending this type of money. We can afford the price, but still feel ripped off to pay this for a room I couldnt wait to check out of.

Reviews.Title: “Overated!!!”
Reviews.Author: Manateelover25
Reviews.Content: I chose this hotel based on all the reviews here on Trip Advisor- and i honeslty think that people are blinded by the fantstic view and the pool area- Which are both wonderful and the staff was very nice as well- however this hotel is in very poor condition! the first room we were given on the fifth floor facing the water had a great view- small room, outdated furnishings and decor,tile floor, stained chair and the binder that had all the hotel info in it had pen scribbles throughout the whole thing- but the worst part was that the door locks have obviously been replaced, and what has been left after the conversion is about a four by two inch gap in the door frame, right where the lock is, not safe at all- i mean how could you change the locks and not secure the huge hole in the door frame? I was disappointed in this and went to the front desk, they gave us the key to the room next door, the doorframe was the same exact way!! and this room had carpet, but it was all ripped up and stained!! i was quite stunned at what i found, also there was no microwave, we decided on keeping our original room and asked for a microwave, in the meantime i went next door to the Comfort Suites to check out their hotel only to find the same front desk clerk who checked us in, i guess both these properties are run by the same company, when i came back i received a call from the front desk staff advising us there were no microwaves available, but they were going to upgrade us to a suite! wow that was wonderful and very good customer service as i was visably disturbed by what i had found at the hotel, We moved into a six floor suite, one of only four i believe on the water side, while were happy to get the upgrade, again the disrepair of the room was a real let down for me. Knobs were missing off of drawers and the closet in the living room, the sofa table was so wobbly that you could barely set anything on it, in the bedroom the mirrod closet door was missing a door, the ceiling was like a 30 year old ceiling that had major water damage and bad patch jobs. there were no pillows or bed linens for the pull out sofa bed,and our door didnt close all the way without slamming it. Also for two days the elavator would not stop on the fourth floor for patrons. I understand the climate can make things difficult, however there is no excuse to change the locks and not secure the door frames, and all the broken or missing items out of the rooms, and we saw three, were very disapointing in a major chain that i have come to love, in fact that same week we stayed at two different Comfort Suites in Miami for four days and our stays were excellent and usually are for this chain. We are coming back to Key West in a few months and unless serious repairs are made, i will look elsewhere,

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: buddwin
Reviews.Content: We stayed 5 days in a suite and it was comfortable, clean, and and great price. The pool is deliteful and the people were very friendly and helpful. Also very convenient to the bus. The only problem was the road noise, but died down after approx. 10 pm.

Reviews.Title: “Time of my life”
Reviews.Author: Kwgrl
Reviews.Content: I loved the stay at the comfort inn key west. The ocean view from the hotel room was amazing. It was very convenient having a restaurant downstairs 24hrs & the room service was great. the live music on Saturday was nice, thank you to Brittny at the front desk she was able to check me in before 3pm, the concierge was very helpful with things to do in key west, I loved my stay will be staying here again. I will recommend it to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “We had a blast!!!!”
Reviews.Author: superiorkelli
Reviews.Content: I thought it was great!!! You should make sure to get a room facing the pool...we were in 427 and it was awesome! The pool was heated and the tiki bar was absolutely fabulous. Cheapest happy hour on the island plus our bartender Stephanie was great at mixing the drinks!!! If your wanting to be close to Duval st....this wouldn't be the place, but we didn't care about going there! The room was very clean and the beds were very comfortable. We only stayed one night but now wish we would have stayed more! Breakfast was basic but we don't eat huge breakfasts anyway. Front desk staff was very accommadating when we asked to switch rooms from an ocean view to pool view. I would reccommend this to anyone who wants a nice place to stay without paying a fortune!

Reviews.Title: “Goods and Not-As-Goods... Final Grade = B”
Reviews.Author: repomaninclt
Reviews.Content: Not-As-Good- room door needed to slam to shut fully, walk space between bed and TV center was pretty thin, tub/shower really needs a bath-mat...very slippery, room refrig froze everything we put in.. Just to note- impossible to turn left out of drive (certainly not the hotel's fault, but was a pain in the butt... ) Good- great view from the room, very friendly, efficient staff- high praise for Paula, our housekeeper.., killer breakfast .. very well stocked and maintained by Hector... , excellent pool area, extremely kind front desk folk who gave us a late checkout the day we left ( late day flight home.. ) Would be glad to recommend this hotel.... and will certainly book again...

Reviews.Title: “pretty bad”
Reviews.Author: cleocaesar
Reviews.Content: We spent 1 night in this Inn and would never go back nor recommend it to anyone. The hotel looked actually ok when we walked in and the staff was helpful (especially a young man behind the desk) but as soon as we took the lift and exited we could see how much renovation needed to be made. Our room was ok but had a smelly carpet, we were tiptoeing around the room. Bathroom was clean but needs serious renovation done too. It had zero charm and for the same price (we paid 200 $) you can get a wonderful room in Key West itself. Avoid it!

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't stay there again”
Reviews.Author: David W
Reviews.Content: Hotels in Key West are expensive and we thought that we'd shave a few dollars by staying at this hotel. We've stayed at numerous Comfort Inns before and have always been pleased; however, on this occasion we were disappointed. The Front Desk staff were not that warm and too matter-of-fact. The elevator was past it's best-before-date and the room was grubby with mold growing around the tile work in the bathroom. The breakfast looked so so; we took one look and went to Denny's next door! This hotel is old and really needs some work to bring it up to scratch.

Reviews.Title: “Not what I expected from comfort inn poor”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Room was small and the bathroom teeny.. We spent more money than ever before for a comfort inn, but the room was disappointing - small and bathroom was very small. The air conditioner was faulty. I called the fron desk to report the problem, but could get no answer, so I made a trip down to get help. They said to use the thermostat on the wall, but this room was one of the ten percent without one. I often wonder if we get sub- standard rooms when using an outside agency to make reservations.

Reviews.Title: “Paradise”
Reviews.Author: Soulglo123
Reviews.Content: I will definitely be staying at comfort inn next time It's in a great location away from the hectic downtown area if your hear to relax the trolley that's a few minutes away from the hotel is a great transportation to duval st. Friendly welcoming people special thanks to Brittney for all her help. The poolside was great

Reviews.Title: “Do NOT get a room on the pool side”
Reviews.Author: Gregmc12
Reviews.Content: Reviewer Seadog1947 says if you want a quiet room, get one on the pool side. I swear on my pets' lives that that is horrible advice. When you book, they ask if you want a room on the pool side. They conveniently leave out that the pool includes a bar that plays music, loudly, all night long, even if no one's at the bar (and no one was.) Unless you enjoy staying awake all hours, don't subject yourself to this punishment. Key West has only two kinds of hotels: expensive resorts, and dismal, overpriced 1950's era dumps like this one. The place is cracked and coming to bits in places. The elevator sounds like it's dying, and the hand-lettered sign that reads "Certificate is in office" doesn't exactly assuage one's fears. The pool itself isn't bad, during daylight hours. There was a mini-fridge in the room. It's one of those motels where you open your curtains and people can watch you and...I'm sorry, it's hard to concentrate as I write this review. Why? Because I'm listening to Paul McCartney and Wings playing "Band on the Run" so loudly my eyes are bleeding. Turning on the air conditioning only muffles the noise slightly. Please speak up, I can't hear you.

Reviews.Title: “Close and Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: SKDas
Reviews.Content: In key west i truly found this hotel as one of the best value. It may be a couple of miles from the heart of the city but there are municipal parking garages in the city center which charges only $13/day. This way it's always nice to stay here and save hundreds of dollars which other downtown hotels charges. Rooms are Clean with wonderful view of the sea. Very nice Hot breakfast was served in the morning. Most important is the excellent staff.I reached at 12 Am and my room was ready. Requested a microwave for my baby and it was immediately fulfilled.They have also a nice pool and a tiki bar where every evening we enjoyed a couple of drinks. Overall wonderful amenities and experience in Key West.I would definitely stay here again in my next trip.

Reviews.Title: “Worn, Not a hint of charm!”
Reviews.Author: stenhugger
Reviews.Content: From reading the other reviews, I should have visited Stephanie at "splash". The truth is that the location is bad, The gangways are worn, There are cracks in the ceiling. All this would be OK if the price was under $100 - but it isn't.

Reviews.Title: “Great views but....”
Reviews.Author: Seadog1947
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located on busy US Route 1 in Key West. Because of the nice water views we opted for a room with views of the water; be mindful however that rooms on the water side also face busy US Route 1 and traffic including motor scooters, trucks, buses etc. For a quieter room choose rooms facing the pool area. The staff is very friendly, the complimentary breakfast is good, and the pool and exercise room are nice. Parking is free and if you purchase tickets on the Old Town Trolley (sales booth located a short walk from the hotel) you can avoid driving in the historic district and paying for parking. Our room was on the fifth floor with great views, the room itself was not up to usual Comfort Inn standards but was clean. It needs upgrading in the bathroom especially the shower and bathtub. The beds were Select Comfort and comfortable. All in all we enjoyed our stay there and would lodge there again.

Reviews.Title: “Best Customer Service Ever!”
Reviews.Author: Winwyngm
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at the Comfort Inn in Key West. The hotel was clean, comfortable and offered a great breakfast. Stephanie, the "Splash" pool bartender was especially terrific. She gave us great suggestions for places to go, things to see and delicious restaurants to visit. All of the Concierge staff was extremely friendly and helpful. My only suggestion would be for the hotel to provide a shuttle service between the hotel, airport and downtown areas as the cost for taxi cabs adds up quickly.

Reviews.Title: “Stephanie the bartender @ the pool bar "splash's" is great!”
Reviews.Author: Walnutcedar
Reviews.Content: We had a great time, the hotel is very clean, the staff is nice and helpful! We especially would like to thanks Stephanie for her wonderful suggestions on things to do during our stay!

Reviews.Title: “Vacation with Dad”
Reviews.Author: Becca N
Reviews.Content: I agree with Tyler W. Stephanie at Splash is great!!! She makes a mean rum punch to boot.

Reviews.Title: “Stephanie at splash was wonderful.”
Reviews.Author: Tyler W
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed a relaxing time and some good food. Well worth it.

Reviews.Title: “Loud music keep you up and ac system not easy to control. Bathroom tiny”
Reviews.Author: Sign4u
Reviews.Content: Average not worth 300 a night. Loud band playing till late and AC system is difficult to manage. Bathroom is very small. Give it a 3.

Reviews.Title: “Pricey for the size of the room”
Reviews.Author: jagsstatman
Reviews.Content: The location was good, not all that far from the attractions. It may have been the time of the year, but the price just seemed a bit high for me for the size of the room. The rooms were clean, pool was clean and heated, plenty of parking around back.

Reviews.Title: “Decent value for your money”
Reviews.Author: ditya6um
Reviews.Content: The hotel has a pretty good location and the lobby area is quite good. Rooms are small but not bad. We requested for a room facing the ocean after we arrived at the hotel and the front desk lady was nice enough to entertain our request. Overall, this is a not an outstanding hotel by any means but it certainly provides the value for your money.

Reviews.Title: “Good location but hotel could need an update”
Reviews.Author: Dagje
Reviews.Content: Good location. Key West is definitely worth a visit! Hotel seemed nice, but had a real 'hotel' atmosphere (not cosy or pleasant, - loads of people walking around). Once going to the room we saw some things that definitely needed some renovation . Room was nice but could use some updating. We got a voucher to have a free drink at the bar, however (and some other guests made the same mistake) once at the bar it turned out the vouchers could only be exchanged when ordering a meal

Reviews.Title: “Great place for a vacation!”
Reviews.Author: anjay96
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay at the Comfort Inn in Key West. Great room with a wonderful view. Clean, secure, and comfortable. The kids really enjoyed the pool. Quiet at night. We hope to make it back someday!

Reviews.Title: “NOT WORTH THE $$---Bad smell”
Reviews.Author: Shannon M
Reviews.Content: A friend of mine and I were booked to stay at this hotel for business in January 2012 ($165 per night that was booked 6 wks in advance). It was comparably priced to the Marriott ($189 per night 6 wks in advance) so I assumed the amenities would be similar.....I WAS WRONG! Arrived to a nice, pleasant lobby with helpful staff.....but that was the end of the positives for us. Arrived to room and the first thing I noticed was a very musty smell in the room. It is an old hotel with the large window and curtain so that anyone can see in if curtain not pulled. It had AC located under window without precise thermostat control. The room was very small and beds were hard as a rock. It had the "ick" factor (stains on the ceiling and wall, bad smell, ect). After looking around for about 20 minutes, we decided we should go to another hotel. Many hotels with no vacancies but was lucky enough to get room at Fairfield Inn for $199 per night. WORTH EVERY PENNY!! When I went back to lobby to inform staff of our decision, there was another woman at the desk complaining of the poor quality amenities. The staff gave her a key to another room for her to inspect to see if she liked it better. (Don't know the result of her inspection).....At my turn to the counter----I politely told the young lady I had decided to opt for another hotel. She told me she understood and politely refunded my money.....no questions asked! I cannot say anything about the pool quality, the breakfast, or bar because we didn't stick around long enough to examine these things.......but I can tell you I will NEVER book another room at a Comfort Inn again.....I am sure there are worse places.....but those you probably pay for by the hour.....

Reviews.Title: “Will stay here again”
Reviews.Author: Heff17
Reviews.Content: My friends and I shared a suite - 2 bedrooms, 2 baths on top floor. Although it's an old hotel and not down where all the action is, we took the trolley (50 yard walk), had great parking, great pool, safe that worked, breakfast with waffles you make yourself along with a lot of other items, and clean rooms. At the end, when we told the desk (very friendly staff) about the refrigerator and sleep number beds not working, they reduced our payment. If found it a good deal and will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Near Yet Far”
Reviews.Author: Williamsburg99
Reviews.Content: My husband and I visited Key West for Christmas. We arrived on Dec. 22 and departed on Dec. 26. The Comfort Inn has some nice amenities -- free breakfast, large pool, pool-side bar and exercise room. Our bed was horribly soft and uncomfortable. However, it is farther from downtown Key West than we would like to be -- but also less expensive -- because we were late in making our reservations. The staff is very friendly and helpful and they work hard to please. The breakfast bar is very complete with everything from juice and cereal to waffles and omlets. You can drive down to Bourbon Street or take a trolley or bus. We had many good meals at the various restaurants, (particularly Bourbon Street, took a "glass bottom boat" cruise (which was a lot of fun), walked along the beach, went shopping and sometimes just hung out at the pool!

Reviews.Title: “Clean room and a Bible”
Reviews.Author: dugan_11
Reviews.Content: If the price is right don't be afraid to book at this hotel. The staff is very friendly. Check in was hastle free. The pool is very nice and the free breakfast is what you would expect at any Comfort Inn. This hotel has plenty of free parking and best of all an in room safe that is actually insured. The room was clean and the cleaning lady actually went to the extent of folding my wadded up clothes on the bed. The Dennys at the hotel is a great late night stop or for when you wake up too late for the continental breakfast. The rooms could use some up dating and shows the typical wear and tear. The down side to this hotel is that the exterior could really use a paint job and to some it might look like an insurance claim waiting to happen. All in all I had a good stay at the comfort in and I would reccomend this hotel to anyone looking for an affordable room with no real frills.

Reviews.Title: “Be Carefull”
Reviews.Author: 2BeachBums2466
Reviews.Content: I can't for the life of me figure out why anyone would give this place a "good" or better rating. I will say this, the pool is heated, there is a tiki bar and there is music but it stopped at 8:00 pm on a Saturday night and the Tiki bar closed at 10:00. So don't plan on relaxing around the pool for drinks and music after a long day downtown. It is a nice courtyard. That's all there is for the good. Now for the bad... The room had a terrible odor as if the carpets had never been cleaned. We took the sheets off the 2nd queen and laid them on the floor to walk on in our bare feet after our shower. There is or was no microwave, so don't think about bringing any leftovers back to room to eat later. The serve yourself American breakfast was something to be desired. We watched them microwave a bag of eggs for the scrambled eggs (not good) and then microwaved some frozen hockey pucks that turned out to be the sausage. So, we opted for the fruit, browning banana's, and oranges that you could not peel, they were very tough thin skinned and nothing but pulp on the inside. (no real flavor). There also is no shuttle to downtown, you have to walk a block to the next hotel for the trolly. I read someones blog that said they had a sleep number bed, ours was not and was never offered a room with one, and we never seen any advertisement for them. For what you get it is way over priced even if it is Key West. For just a few dollars more our next trip will be at the Marriott across the street. We live in south Florida and frequent the keys often and have tried a few hotels in Key West. every time we try and save a few bucks only to come home disappointed. From now on we will be spending a few bucks more and get a lot more amenities. Oh and our stay was in mid December 2011.

Reviews.Title: “should be torn down”
Reviews.Author: JohnGross
Reviews.Content: this place was at one time very nice but the property is very old .it's clean but falling apart .over priced for what you get. if it rains you may get water dripping in your room or as you walk under the outside walkways because the are cracked open and just waiting to fall down it seems like. the help is very nice but they can't make up in what your room is forget internet connection unless your in the lobby

Reviews.Title: “I do not get the good reviews”
Reviews.Author: ChipLondon
Reviews.Content: Sorry but I just do not get it, how can this tired and noisy hotel get any good reviews. We had to change rooms because the first one was just musty and dated. The so called comfy bed was not, and the noise at the front of the hotel was impossible to stay in. We moved to a better room at the back but the noise was still their. This is more like a motel than a hotel, but just not worth the rate paid. The pool area is quite nice, but dispute the fact that they swipe a credit card on arrival, you are unable to charge things to your room. The old " we are surrounded by water" excuse does not work with me, I live on the water in Miami, but my home does not smell musty. There are many other places to stay in KW choose one of those

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Type of Hotel with nothing fancy”
Reviews.Author: bradshawbolton
Reviews.Content: Spent 2 laid back nights here, the rooms were adequate and clean for our short stay. Nice pool and pool bar at rear of building which we enjoyed in the evenings. We had a free breakfast each morning that was a nice extra to start the day. There is a Trolly bus running into Key West that stops almost outside the front of the hotel what a bonus after a day spent walking round the town. We would certainly stay here again if we ever return.

Reviews.Title: “Loved It!”
Reviews.Author: Brittny K
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here for our first anniversary and we loved it! The concierge, Terry Underwood, was more than helpful. Not only did he recommend restaurants and adventures but he also gave us a brief history of Key West. The food at the poolside bar was great and very reasonably priced. The hotel was kind of far from downtown but right next to it was a place to rent bicycles and scooters. We had a great time renting the bikes and exploring the island. My favorite part of the hotel was the Sleep Number bed in our room! I would recommend this hotel to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Comfy”
Reviews.Author: Godowndahighway
Reviews.Content: Was waiting on my next load am a professional driver was amased that this place has parking for a 18 wheeler was a bit pricey but very relaxing if I get another load down here I am sooo staying here

Reviews.Title: “TRULY WAS COMFORT”
Reviews.Author: Kalena52
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 2 nights and was very pleased with our room. The rate was reasonable, the staff friendly. Great pool and awesome view. The room was very clean. Yes, it had a a damp smell but remember you are on a very small island and it is very hot and humid here. I would definitely recommend this hotel without hesitation. It truly was a Comfortable Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Comfy beds and a great pool”
Reviews.Author: myhusbandandi
Reviews.Content: Although parts of the hotel are showing their age a bit, our room was very clean and the bed very comfortable. All the staff were welcoming, friendly and keen to help us get the best from our stay. The pool area was great - warm water and plenty of sun beds. Good choice at breakfast. The hotel is almost next door to a Old Town Trolley Tours stop (last trolley leaves Mallory Square at 5.30pm). We enjoyed our stay - thanks.

Reviews.Title: “Good all round hotel”
Reviews.Author: Saral
Reviews.Content: The Comfort Inn is two minutes away by car as soon as you land on Key West and 3 miles to the Duval Street area. The hotel is a 'motel' style hotel with the rooms facing onto an outdoor corridor rather than inside to a hallway. The rooms are a pretty good size, were well maintained and have everything you would need. Nice flat screen TV, coffee machine, refridgerator. The pool is not a bad size and the area round it is well kept. The staff on the desk were pleasant and helpful. The free breakfast is more than sufficient, and is being re-stocked constantly. The Dennys next door is even not that bad! The only minor improvement that could be made is to tidy up and maintain walk ways around the rooms a little bit.

Reviews.Title: “Absolute Comfort”
Reviews.Author: yesboss27
Reviews.Content: we were upgraded to a suite by the oceanfront. We were very pleased with the spacious, clean and quiet room with a spectacular view. Flat screen in the living room was nice; enjoyed the football game :) The breakfast was very nice; no need to go to Denny's or IHOP. Really, you will be pleasantly surprised with everything they have for breakfast buffet. The staff was friendly overall. We enjoyed the tiki bar by swimming pool with a few snacks in the evening. This is really a nice place for the price and I would stay there again in future.

Reviews.Title: “Bad experience”
Reviews.Author: luv2travelmexico
Reviews.Content: Both elevators were antique and broken, the carpet was not clean and it smelled like mold. Beds were comfortable and the breakfast was OK. One of the men that was working on the elevator was very rude and cussed me.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: Frank R
Reviews.Content: Very nice vacation. Hotel was better than average, service was great, and the city speaks for itself.

Reviews.Title: “Comfort, Value, Friendy Staff”
Reviews.Author: DMT53
Reviews.Content: We just enjoyed a 3 day stay and had a great time! The staff was very friendly and always asking if there was anything they could do to assist us.Although it is an older facility it is well maintained. The room was clean and comfortable with a mattress ( Select # ) that you would expect in a much pricier hotel. The breakfast had a good variety with hot and cold items to suite any diet. The pool and deck area are very inviting with a nice poolside bar.The recommendations from the concierge were all good. The location is good, away from the hectic downtown with shuttles and trams next door at a nominal rate. All in all, we received a lot of value for our moneyl We will continue to go back and recommend to family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “My Fantastic Stay at the Comfort Inn Key West”
Reviews.Author: Allie1347
Reviews.Content: My weekend was great thanks to the Comfort Inn Key West!! Check-in desk staff greeted us with a Welcome Smile - that started our afternoon off in the right direction. From the spacious room, beautiful, free form swiming pool to the funTiki Hut Bar, I knew we were in for a great time! Our spacious room overlooking the pool was clean and welcoming - our home away from home!! Highly recommend staying at the Comfort Inn Key West!

Reviews.Title: “I have stayed here twice already and coming back for third time”
Reviews.Author: islandgirl0604
Reviews.Content: I had stayed at this hotel twice so far and each time I stayed I have never had a bad experience! The first time we rented the suite since we had 2kids with us and we were staying longer, very nice! The second time was with my daughter and son when we came to check out the college there, and now we will be coming into town for a mother/daughter stay and going to Goombay Oct. 20, staying 4 nights and can't wait!!! This comfort inn may be old, but they have done a lot since it was the Sheraton, BIG improvement! I really enjoyed it, hope we have just as good of a time when we come there in 10more days! I know we will!

Reviews.Title: “Trip to Key west”
Reviews.Author: tennbulldog
Reviews.Content: This is my second stay at the Comfort Inn in Key West. The room was great! The breakfast was great! The front desk people were friendly and helpful. The staff was wonderful. Jamie & Terry at the Conceirge desk were fantastic! They gave us recommendations on were to go, how to save money, & gave us discount coupons. The cleaning people were on top of everything. Everyone was friendly. We liked the select number beds. Even maintenance guys Ken & Stan would stop and want to make sure everything was to our satisfaction. Really cool pool and poolside bar. I'm can't wait to come back to Key West and the Comfort Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Stay at the Comfort inn”
Reviews.Author: Styxz
Reviews.Content: My stay here was excellent, the room were clean and well stocked, the staff Ally, Agnes, brittney and Marc were very nice looking and friendly. The view from the room of the ocean was very nice and after a long flight here it was nice and refreshing.

Reviews.Title: “Good nights sleep”
Reviews.Author: Barbara L
Reviews.Content: I choose this hotel as it had parking which is not always available. I would have liked to have been closer to the shopping & attractions but there was the trolley. The elevator was hot as it had no air & I was happy that it did not break down with me in it. The breakfast was just great. The beds (sleep number) were terrific. I always wanted to try one. The rooms were clean & the staff friendly & helpful.

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING EXPERIENCE AT THE COMFORT INN KEY WEST FLORIDA :-}”
Reviews.Author: Lilly F
Reviews.Content: Being myself in the hotel industry I have always stayed at my chain and that is Hilton properties. I have never stayed in a hotel that from the moment I walked in I was welcomed with the warmest friendliest smile. The rooms were very clean and very well kept. They even have those sleep number beds that was AWESOME!!! Mona Reiner I have to thank you for giving me the chance to have one of the most amazing stays at a hotel that I have ever had. I cant wait to go back. The pool area was SO BEAUTIFUL. I just loved everything about this hotel. I want to thank the Comfort Inn for there great service. KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK!!!! :-}

Reviews.Title: “"Great location & customer service"”
Reviews.Author: Jeannie T
Reviews.Content: I stayed here on a recent trip to key west with my husband,sister and brother-in-law. I found the hotel to be a bit older and looks like it has been through alot but the rooms their self were not bad they smelled amazing and fresh. They have an amazing pool area with a splash bar right there for drinks or food. Their is a dennys inside the hotel which is nice if you are looking for alittle more than what they have to offer on their breakfast. The customer service was great, very helpful with all the questions we had about the area. I would stay here again!!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice place Nice price”
Reviews.Author: DVK1
Reviews.Content: I had been to Key West in June 2011 and this was the least expensive place I could find. Rate: At $115, it is expensive for a 2 Star hotel. But by Key West standards, it is a pretty good deal. And it is not a 3 star as suggested by Tripadvisor. Check In / Check Out: Agnes (I think) checked us in, in under a minute and check out was less than 20 seconds. That is Awesome! Room: Pretty good room and has the standard everything. Other areas of the hotel: The walkway to the room & the old elevator needed some cleaning ... but who cares ...as long as our room, lobby, pool were clean Staff: Very helpful. The old guy at the activity desk was also friendly. Restaurant: There is a Denny's on site and a Tiki bar near the pool Parking: Free It is a 6 miles from "Duval Street" (where the action).... but the hotels there are $200 and above.

Reviews.Title: “"very nice attention"”
Reviews.Author: edgar r
Reviews.Content: We received a very nice attention of all people working in this hotel. Marc and Ashley were very friendly and help us all time. The room is very comfortable, the pool and the splash bar are agreables. We expect come back next year and we will say our family to come here. Thanks, thanks, thanks. Edgar and Gloria.

Reviews.Title: “Great pool”
Reviews.Author: darkymark
Reviews.Content: Would stay again, pool area with bar really nice, rooms clean and functional, staff friendly, obviously its a little way out from Duval street and is a taxi job. The beds were comfy and free internet access and computers at reception all worked well.

Reviews.Title: “Great time and we'll do it again”
Reviews.Author: Gary F
Reviews.Content: The facility offers a free breakfast which is a great way to start the day's activities. All the people working at this place were very friendly and helpful. One person that stood out was Hector who handled the Breakfast Room activities. He kept everything clean and stocked and was very engaging with the patrons.

Reviews.Title: “Labor Day Weekend”
Reviews.Author: robert8185
Reviews.Content: I just got back from our stay at the Comfort Inn in Key West and decided it needed to be reviewed seeing that it is ranked 40 of 41 Hotels in Key West. This hotel was exactly what me and my friends were looking for. We arrived Sunday to spend the day in Key West but upon our arrival the day was so nice we decided to rent a hotel for the night and really enjoy ourselves. As soon as we entered Key West we began calling Hotels to check for availability and pricing. All the hotels were either around or above the rate we received for the Comfort Inn, so we booked it. We were literally 1 minute from the hotel in a parking lot when we did book it and once we arrived the room was already ready for us to check-in to. The room was very clean and spacious. Nothing crazy out of this world but never the less it was a clean comfy room. The beds are sleep number beds, which really didn't make a difference to us as they were already at a comfortable setting once we arrived. There was even space to throw in a small (single/full) inflatable bed. There are also ice machines and coke vending machines on each floor so you don't have to go far for ice. The pool area looked very fun, even though we never got in it. There were a lot of people enjoying it from kids to older adults. Upon check-in they gave us 3 vouchers for drinks at the bar which comes in handy. Definitely felt like you were in Key West while hanging out there. Another great convenience was the fact that this hotel offered free breakfast in the morning. Not sure quite what was offered since we never went but I heard it lasted to around 10am which is a lot longer than most hotels. We did however visit the Denny's located next to the Lobby downstairs after we checked out. The service there was a bit slow but expected since everyone was checking out after a long weekend. There is plenty of parking in the front and in the rear of the hotel. So no need to worry about paying for parking (very common in Key West) or having to hustle your way for parking passes if your party has multiple vehicles. Also nice was the fact that directly in front of the hotel was a stop for the Trolley that takes you around Key West if you don't want to drive. There also was a place to rent scooters/electric cars really nearby if you rather do that. Nice options to have if you plan on visiting Duval Street/Mallory Square since it is about 5-10 mins from the hotel. MY ONLY complaint about this hotel is the elevators. They only have 2 elevators (one in the front by the entrance of the lobby and the other by the side/pool area) and BOTH are pretty slow and HOT! But this is nothing that really inconvenienced us or caused us to have a bad time. In conclusion if you plan on traveling to Key West and are contemplating this hotel don't worry. You will get a good place at a good price. Can't wait to go again!

Reviews.Title: “"We loved and we'will be back"”
Reviews.Author: Lazaro V
Reviews.Content: My domestic partner and I have been going to Key West since last March,2011 and always preferred to stay at the "Comfort Inn" because we have always had a professional and excellent costumer service.The front desk crew:Marc,Vitaly,Iana,Brittany and Will headed by Ms Agnes are extremly profesional.We have had the opportunity to meet all of them.They always go behind the line of duty to help us.We stay in the 6th floor in a very comfortable suite that we relax and we feel we are back at home.The hotel has a perfect location with one side looking towards the ocean and the other one looking towards the beautiful swimming pool and a view of the city of Key West.The best thingwe like from the hotel is the fact of his location and also that offers a gym and a Tiki Bar by the pool.There is also a "Denny's" by the lobby area.We highly recommed this hotel to all my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “Great service/Great room!”
Reviews.Author: scott k
Reviews.Content: We found the staff to be excellent and very helpful. Marc at the front desk helped us with every aspect of our stay. Bernice and Greg helped us immeasurably as our concierge with all of our adventures on the island. We would recommend this hotel to anyone. Everyone on staff was excellent. Nice large pool and lounge area as well. Thank again!!! Scott & Tina

Reviews.Title: “Nothing fancy but would stay here again.”
Reviews.Author: concernedmom12
Reviews.Content: Got this hotel through Expedia unpublished. Rated a 3 star but certainly not a 3 star room. Room was clean. Wouldn't want to spend any time in the bathroom as tiny and just functional. Lovely view of the Gulf from our room. Staff was super friendly and helpful. Pool area and lobby were fabulous. Pool was worthy of any 5 star resort and had a nice bar beside it that you could eat at. Only 1 elevator functioned which was a nuisance. Hallways leading from elevator to room were grungy. Hotel had its pros and cons but our experience was overall pleasant. I was worried to stay there after reading some of these reviews but I guess it depends on what room you are assigned.

Reviews.Title: “Good for the price.”
Reviews.Author: courteliz2008
Reviews.Content: Very noisy-we were on the ocean view side; however the main highway was right there. But if we stayed on the pool side, it would have also been loud. Enjoyed we were away from the hustle and bustle of the main town. Front desk was helpful when our shower drain clogged. It was very much a beach bungalo feel, which we always appreciate. Rooms were clean and tidy. Would consider going and staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Comfort Inn Key West - Not bad, 5 minute ride to Duval”
Reviews.Author: MasterTravelers
Reviews.Content: Okay folks, it's not a 5 star, and it may need some cosmetic work, but the pool was great - the drinks were strong - the breakfast was good and you could eat as much as you wanted. I requested a roll away and they brought it to my room - no questions asked. The cleaning ladies and the two nice ladies that checked us in were very sweet and got us into our room quickly... no line - no wait. The room was the typical room, two beds, vanity, chair, TV and bathroom. It was clean and quiet at night. The room was too cold! their A/C wall units work like a charm in the SUPER HOT KEY WEST sun! So my traveling friends, stay here with no worries... don't expect Casa Marina, but you will not be disappointed. Oh almost forgot - they have SLEEP NUMBER BEDS - Cool! And there are two computer terminals in the lobby along with a very nice lady selling FURY tours and such. If you have the energy, do the all day Fury Tour - you will be gievn many options (water play) to spend your day - your gonna get wet and very tired after it all - a more relaxing tour is to the Dry Tortugas, you will take a quick Cat or a go fast boat out to the old Ft - you get a tour of the fort and then spend the rest of your afternoon basking in the sun. PLEASE take a good suncreen. I went snokeling for a couple of hours and my back side was on fire!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel with the nicest people”
Reviews.Author: MikeRNewJersey
Reviews.Content: Stayed here with our Boy Scout troop before departing for a sailing trip. Mona and Holly were great to deal with. Price was great and included breakfast. Pool was clean and well kept. Pool bar had good food with good service. Had to go food shopping before we left hotel and Mona even lent us her car!!! Where does that ever happen? Sailing trip got cut short...called Holly for 16 rooms on a whim. She had us booked in under 15 minutes! Lobby is nice and if you don't mind a little bike ride (15mins) you can be on Duval street that quick. This place is also close to the airport (5 mins). Would highly recommend this hotel for groups and those who are looking for a nice hotel at a resonable price. I would absolutely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Old Bones, But a Nice Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: ReubenWesley
Reviews.Content: A nice place to stay while in Key West. Good for the money. Fantastic pool area. Beautiful view across the flats. Away from the main attraction area/streets, but this may not be a bad thing (everything is easy to get to in Key West). I thought it was very quiet. I would recommend this hotel for the cost-conscious traveler, and I would go back in a minute.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome hotel!!! I would do it all over again!”
Reviews.Author: lulita0720
Reviews.Content: Comfort in has this amazing location. Gorgeous view from tour room. We had an ocean view and we watched the sunset every night. They offer free breakfast and free WiFi !! The locations is awesome because you have the shopping mall near you( walking distance) also if u want to save money their is McDonald's and Wendy's there. The room is very clean with lots or mirrors ;-) everyone in key west is cool, down to earth and helpful. You will have people come up to talk to you and ask you where your from. The taxi service is easy and cheap if your not driving. The pool is just excellent. It's open till midnight. It's pretty big, very clean, well maintained, their is a bar right there by the pool so you can grab a drink and chill in the water. I have nothing to say to critique this hotel. We had soo much fun we would defiantly come back here again.

Reviews.Title: “Won't Be Back”
Reviews.Author: notneedyatall
Reviews.Content: Stay away, m not sure if management changed recently or what all the great reviews are about. I will give them the breakfast, very impressive. Everything else for the money, not worth it. 1 of the 2 elevators has been out our whole stay, and instead of putting an out of order or not working sign(they just put up a routine scheduled maintenance, you mean to tell me that your elevator routinely breaks down, days at a time)? First room we checked into, was unacceptable(door didn't close all the way), very noisy(we were moved to another room) after a bad nights sleep(no one went out of there way to say sorry or make us feel welcome). They did have a nice pool and bar, food was not bad. Our new room, the beds are sleep numbers(ours didnt' work) so half of my bed was set to 40 and the other side 100, I let front desk know, and they just said, is it connected????? Did not offer further assistance. I just wanted to make sure they knew we didn't break it. I voiced my opinion to management and staff, apparently I didn't speak to the right people, cause nothing was done to help accomodate our needs. Asked if they wanted us to leave, was told, do what you gotta do. First time to the keys, and we won't be back to comfort inn, (not for the price of a hilton, and the glammer of a motel 6), no thank you......And comfort inn(staff), when a guest complains, tell management, and management(train your staff to alert you when there are problems with guest. It usually only takes a few minutes of your time to make things right, and that is what you were hired to do). Thanks for the great Birthday experience, and the choice priveledge rewards(what a joke)............get it together people, spend some money customer service, some vents for bathrooms and working elevators, who cares about clean remote controls, pools and gulf are just as dirty....and tell your employees who get to stay there for $35 a night, (to keep it to themselves, especially when the rest of us are paying up to $200 a night) The last comfort inn I stayed in was in dallas, tx and it was $80.00 for same exact room we had in keys, dallas comfort inn dominated this one, and gave me a real perpesctive on how I spend my hard earned money.......

Reviews.Title: “We must have picked the wrong weekend to be here”
Reviews.Author: Iheartmytravels
Reviews.Content: Coming into Key West we thought we would find a decent hotel for a decent price. We didn't know it was Mel Fisher week and that prices were sky high. We only took this hotel because we were tired of looking around. We could have gotten more bang for our buck if the festival wasn't going on. $200 for one night. But we needed a place to stay and there were only 2 rooms left. Anyway place was fairly clean. Quiet enough. Laundry on site. Nice pool. Free breakfast. Fridge in our room. Beach access close by. Decent restraunts close by. Next time we're booking in advance or visiting on a non-festival weekend

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: Dennis1203
Reviews.Content: The rooms are very clean and the property is well cared for. It is like a mini resort, big enough pool, with bar and grill pool side. In the lobby is a concierge for local info, used one of the restaurant suggestion, was lousy! So take with a adventuresome willingness to use suggestions. FIND Pepe restruant, great food and very locals feel.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: Mhoneydo
Reviews.Content: Good location to stay away from the crowds of Duval Street. Nice view of the bay. We had a 4th floor bay view room. It was very nice. You can hear some traffic at night but it did not distract me. The room had 2 sleep number beds that were like sleeping on an air matress. If one person got out of bed, the other would sink to the bottom. It was comfortable but I would not purchase one. The pool area was beautiful and a great place to wind down the day and start the night. It was shallow (4+ft) but perfect for socializing. The pool has a bar. Towels are supplied at the front desk. The front desk staff were very friendly and helpful (Marc). Breakfast was good and plentiful. Eggs, sausage, cereal, bagels, etc.. I would definetely come back.

Reviews.Title: “Aweful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ledsak
Reviews.Content: This used to be a Radisson Hotel, but no longer qualified for the Radisson name so they purchased a Comfort Inn franchise. We stayed here one night on a quick trip to Key West this past weekend. The hotel was likely built over 40 years ago and looks like it. The rooms were dingy and entered from the outside (more of a motel than a hotel). The carpet had traffic patterns and the wallpaper was peeling. The bedspread was outdated and we immediately removed it from the bed to avoid touching it anymore than needed. The chairs were stained due to age and the tub didn't drain very quickly (and I love standing in a pool of water while showering). The room we had was a smoking room (we don't smoke so that was wonderful). Do hotels even allow smoking anymore? Apparently this one didn't get the memo. This is pretty much a dump and for a few dollars more, I am sure you can stay at a much nicer hotel (and trust me, you will want to). This hotel is hanging on by a thread and while they seem to sell out (at least that is what they told us), I would recommend tearing it down and starting over. The location is not too convenient, but cabs are available to take you downtown. Best thing about this hotel? There is a Denny's in the lobby for your hangover after to drink yourself to sleep to forget about the room you are staying in. Oh, apparently they spent money for something called the 'Clean Remote' - maybe the money would have been better spent on new bedspreads or really anything else.

Reviews.Title: “Truly Paradise!!!!”
Reviews.Author: rapunzelhair1
Reviews.Content: We were so pleased to say the least with our stay at the Comfort Inn. What a beautiful property. We absoulutely loved Splash poolside bar. The service was over the top....beyond any expectations we had. Brad was extremely courteous. He provided 5-star service you'd expect at a high end establishment!! Totally not expected at a poolside bar. The drinks were perfect!!! The food was delicious, and the portions were huge!!! Definitely a great value for our money. Nick the manager made sure all our needs were being met. We are planning frequent trips down to Key West, and would love to make this our future destination. Thanks for such a great experience!!

Reviews.Title: “Stay far away from this roach inn”
Reviews.Author: justmedascorp
Reviews.Content: If you love roaches and want to have a good time with them, then stay at the Comfort Inn in Key West. The management and front desk staff are extremely nonchalant and I am sure they are aware of this problem. After driving for over 3 hrs to get to Key West for an overnight stay, my friends and I had ended up leaving at 2 in the morning and driving allthe way back to the Miami area. Anywho, all they were willing to do was give a $25 coupon. I say stay far away from this roach inn!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Awful place”
Reviews.Author: Dlo83
Reviews.Content: Well, where do I start?!? We were given a room that was $10 less than the Best Western (which was excellent) but was completely booked so went to comfort inn. We got the room but went straight to the beach to relax. When we went to the room we lay on the bed and watch TV. AND the cockroach walk over the screen!!! Then noticed tomato sauce on the floor!! Made a complaint and moved rooms. Went to bed after checking it for creepy crawlies! However when in bed other people walked into our room- which had been given to other guests!! We complained in the morning and we were given 50% off. We accepted as we just wanted to GET OUT!! We then emailed the company to complain further but havnt heard back from them 1 month on!! DO NOT STAY HERE IT WILL RUIN YOUR STAY!!! Spend a bit more money and enjoy your stay somewhere else!!

Reviews.Title: “Great relaxing time in Key West”
Reviews.Author: 239Redfish
Reviews.Content: Our room was right over the pool and Splash Bar (world's best poolside chickee bar). We stayed a week and many days just relaxed at the pool and large deck area. The hotel is next to one of the Trolley tour stops. The Trolley is the best way to see Key West. The drivers are very knowledgable and you can get on and off the trolley as many times as you like during the day. We had a 2 day pass. The hotel has nice rooms and serves a free breakfast every morning between 7 & 10 AM. The Splash Bar at poolside serves wonderful food. Try the Bubba basket or any of the other shrimp dinners! All the bartenders are very friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “nothing good”
Reviews.Author: comfortman53
Reviews.Content: For $250.00 a night i got a view of trash cans and large air condition units. The room was very small and had a lousy TV. The free sunshine morning meal was a joke. KEY WEST itself is great ! The long drive is worth it!!!!!!!!!! note; u do not want a room on the second floor facing the pool....

Reviews.Title: “Okay service and hotel, but not the best location...”
Reviews.Author: shannon18v
Reviews.Content: Okay, so let me start by saying that everything in Key West is SUPER expensive, especially the hotel accomodations. This hotel is a good value, the rooms are clean and adequate. The pool area was nice and never super crowded when we were there. However, there was some water leaking from above us through the ceiling. When we called the front desk, they did come assist us in good time. They also offered us another room, but since it was not leaking on us directly, we chose to just stay there unless the problem became worse or unbearable. We did eat the free breakfast most mornings, which was nice to have. There is also a Denny's attached to the hotel and free wifi which worked great. Going back to the point that Key West is $$$$, the location is not great. I knew this upon booking the hotel and wanted/needed to save some $$$$ so that I could afford the attractions. I traveled with my Mother and we rented bikes to get around downtown. That worked, but what this hotel should possibly do is offer shuttle buses like some of the other hotels nearby offer. I would stay here again, but only if it is one of the cheapest options once again (due to the location and needing to get extra transportation).

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay out of old town”
Reviews.Author: 36267Cathy
Reviews.Content: We have been to Key West many many times and this is the first time we stayed at the Comfort Inn. Would definitely return. LOVED the Splash bar and especially our bartender, Nick. He made us feel like we were old friends.

Reviews.Title: “Bugs ,Fleas, smelly and very very expensive”
Reviews.Author: adriandorofte
Reviews.Content: The place is A dump and there are cockroaches everywhere+ some fleas that jump in the bed. We tried 2rooms but there all the same. We paid.... R u ready ?! 175 1 st night 239 the second night This is unacceptable. This plac is a total wet of money and time

Reviews.Title: “Everything but the room”
Reviews.Author: klein1969
Reviews.Content: I guess Key West prices are just outrageous. The rooms are really not clean (our daughter walked around barefoot for 5 min and had pitchblack feet) & smell like mildew so paying on average $200 for a 2-Queen is a stretch. The sunny breakfast is also a bit overcast: basic and in an unattractive location nextdoor. What does work is the pool which is nice enough, with decent towels and not overcrowded. Having laundry facilities was a nice plus while being on the road but I guess I would have voted for a cleaner room instead.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice location!”
Reviews.Author: debmac66
Reviews.Content: We would recommend this Comfort Inn for fellow travellers. The location is perfect - ocean view ot the west! It is not very far to the Old Key West centre, and the sights. The staff are very friendly and helpful. Our room was clean and comfortable, but the beds were queen size, but felt more like a double - not very comfortable for a good nights sleep for a couple. The water pressure coming out of the showerhead was very weak, and didn't make for a good shower, but the bathroom was clean. The internet was easily accessible, and fast. The breakfast room was very spacious and offered a nice selection, including fresh waffles.

Reviews.Title: “Will not go back”
Reviews.Author: Commentaires
Reviews.Content: The bed was comfortable, the sheets were clean, the breakfast was fair and it's about it for the positive side. The room was so noisy you have the feeling to sleep directly on the highway. The carpet was so dirty you have a hard time to figure the actual colors. The bathroom has been poorly renovated: the paperwall curls, the bath was recovered and the bottom pops up and down when you move on. Go in the old town, there are several nice hotel and inns.

Reviews.Title: “I loved it here!”
Reviews.Author: irishojos1948
Reviews.Content: We spent our first night at the front of the hotel and there is a lot of noise from traffic. Next moorning I saw a cockroach in the room and called the front desk just to inform them. I know that these pests can easily get into crevices and are not an indication of dirt when you only see one. The staff cordially offerred me another room. We were moved to the 5 th floor and at the back and that also took care of the noise level. I want to say I did not ask to be moved. The staff made every effort for my comfort, therefore this place deserves higher ratings. There is a 24 hour dennys on premise also and the breakfast has evrything but bacon. I would come here again

Reviews.Title: “Lots of money for a really poor experience”
Reviews.Author: rams2050
Reviews.Content: First, the hotel tried to put us in a room with a view of a trash can and a cement block pillar -- for almost $300 per night. I complained and they moved us to a room with a beautiful view of the Gulf -- but it was noisy, noisy, noisy. No exhaust fan to run to drown out the sound and the air conditioner/fan kept cycling on and off all night. That also woke us up. People kept coming in to the hotel at all hours and it was as if they were partying right next to our beds -- that is how poorly insulated the hotel is! This hotel is sorely in need of a total upgrade. In fact, it should be torn down and rebuilt -- to 21st century standards. Probably one of the worst hotels -- if not THE worst -- that we have ever stayed at -- other than the view. Would NEVER EVER go there again, not even it it were FREE!! The one good thing? NO bed bugs. Thank God!

Reviews.Title: “Not Cheap and Not Nice”
Reviews.Author: rogchez
Reviews.Content: The reception staff members were good and Harry, the concierge was extremely helpful. That apart, there was not much to recommend about this hotel. We paid less for far better ion this trip. The room was sad, jaded and faded â€“ it desperately needed redecoration. There was a stale smell in the room which improved a little when we switched off the air-conditioning but did not entirely disappear â€“ we sued several air deodorizer units to make it bearable. Our room was described as pool view --- for pool view read car park view! The place was noisy until 4:00 a.m. Apart from the may late teenage / early 20 youths being noisy most of the night, the sound of Harleys being revved up most of the evening by the many â€˜HOGSâ€™ staying there was not pleasant. Why do young women have to scream so much? It seems that the ones we had staying here could scream to Olympic standard. It also seems there were Olympic athletes here too --- why else would people be running up and down the walkways besides the bedroom until the small hours? Good parts â€“ nice bar, decent pool and a fitness centre. This place cost us far too much for far too little. We stayed at a place in Marathon, that was 30 bucks cheaper the night before and was vastly superior in all ways

Reviews.Title: “Nice amenities, decent rooms, needs some remodeling and was too expensive”
Reviews.Author: calviaje
Reviews.Content: We went to Key west for only 2 days and stayed at this hotel, the heated pool was great, very relaxing and clean, his outdoor bar was nice, and the fitness center was small but with new equipments. The rooms were decent, the bathrooms were clean but really small the halls to get to the rooms need repairing. The hotel has free parking which is very convenient and the location is ok. The staff was kind and helpful. I have been in many comfort inn hotels and this one has been the most expensive. Even when our staying was pleasent over there we consider it was too expensive.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our stay, nice pool area with tiki bar.”
Reviews.Author: cmfalcon
Reviews.Content: The rooms were nice however staying near the front of the hotel borders HWY 1. While we had a nice view of the bay the highway was very busy and noisy. Breakfast was what you would expect for a continental. Dennys restaurant is connected if you want more. Easy to get to Old Town and nice when checking out being so close to the exit from the island. Overall we enjoyed our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Another bad one in key west”
Reviews.Author: wrecktek
Reviews.Content: My last stay I stayed at the quality inn next door. It was bad so I tried this one this time. Well it was so bad I called choice hotels to get my money back told me in room wifi -not. Room smelled of smoke it was non smoking told me wifi was down but it wasn't it didn't exist hotel just told lies to cya I will not stay again

Reviews.Title: “bed bugs in comfort inn”
Reviews.Author: travelmon7
Reviews.Content: I saw blood spots on the sheets one morning, read later that this could be bed bugs that bite at night. Now I have a staph infection in my right leg from one, Another bite on the forehead is not infected. If they are in one room they can easily be in more.

Reviews.Title: “I would sleep in my car before returning here.”
Reviews.Author: bobjohn2324
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel chain and never have I had an experience like this one. The front staff was rude. The room was not very clean upon check in and not very well kept during stay. The air conditioning unit spit out black blobs of gunk and made a horrible sound when starting. The only positive thing about the hotel was the pool area and pool, but I was a bit leary of going in the pool after the room experience. The so called high-speed internet was like dial-up and unsecured. Do not stay here!

Reviews.Title: “Great place! A little far from Duval but...”
Reviews.Author: simpIndianapolis
Reviews.Content: Great place! A little far from Duval but cabs are easy to find. Great pool bar!

HotelInfo.Name: Comfort Inn Key West
HotelInfo.Address: 3820 North Roosevelt Boulevard, Key West, FL 33040-4599
